# XmlNodeExtensions class

Static class than contains extension methods for XmlNode objects.

```csharp
public static class XmlNodeExtensions
```

## Public Members

| name | description |
| --- | --- |
| static [FindNode](XmlNodeExtensions/FindNode.md)(…) | Finds specified node in *nodeName* into current node. If not found returns null (Nothing in Visual Basic). |
